name: Withering Dreams
description:
Haunted by a tragic past, Mateo is trying to escape and start anew. But what happens when everything they’ve been running from comes knocking at their door? 

Withering Dreams is a project created by Moose and Neph with lead coder Jiinh using RPG Maker MV for the 4th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam. 

This is our first RPG Maker Game but definitely not our last! I feel like we learned so much from this project and am excited to see what we come up with in the future! 
-Moose-

We hope you enjoy our short RPG Maker horror game!
